title: SAP Enterprise Solutions
description: Developing and maintaining cloud-native microservices for SAP Globalization. Working with Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, and SAP UI5 to build scalable enterprise-level solutions deployed globally.

title: Jira Kanban Enhancement
description: Contributed to big side projects using TamperMonkey, plugin architecture and TypeScript to adapt Jira Kanban Boards to specific team needs, improving workflow efficiency for the development team.

title: Rescue Robot - OBR Competition
description: Developed a rescue robot project with my high school team for the Brazilian Robotics Olympiad (OBR). Achieved 3rd place at state level and Top 13th nationally, working on robotics, automation, and team coordination.

title: CI/CD Automation & DevOps
description: Automated deployment processes and tasks via scripts and CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions. Implemented best practices for continuous delivery, leveraging AI and LLMs to enhance development workflow efficiency.
